title: The 5G airport freakout, explained
description:
The FAA is worried about your cellphone again. Recode’s Rebecca Heilweil explains. 

Read Rebecca’s story: https://www.vox.com/recode/2022/1/12/22878622/5g-airplanes-c-band-interference-faa

Today’s episode was produced by Victoria Dominguez , engineered by Paul Mounsey and hosted by Adam Clark Estes.
